Deathblade.name: Deathblade
Deathblade.effect: On kill or assist, gain +15 attack.

Giant Slayer.name: Giant Slayer
Giant Slayer.effect: Basic attacks deal 8% of the target's current health as physical damage.

Hextech Gunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
Hextech Gunblade.effect: Basic Attacks and spells heal for 25% of damage dealt.

Spear of Shojin.name: Spear of Shojin
Spear of Shojin.effect: After casting a spell, basic attacks restore 18% of maximum mana.

Guardian Angel.name: Guardian Angel
Guardian Angel.effect: When the wearer dies, revive with up to 400 health after a 2 second delay once per combat.

Bloodthirster.name: Bloodthirster
Bloodthirster.effect: Basic attacks heal for 40% of damage dealt.

Zeke's Herald.name: Zeke's Herald
Zeke's Herald.effect: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain +20% attack speed.

Guinsoo's Rageblade.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
Guinsoo's Rageblade.effect: On basic attack, gain +4% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat.

Statikk Shiv.name: Statikk Shiv
Statikk Shiv.effect: On every third basic attack, deal 100 magical damage to 3 enemies.

Runaan's Hurricane.name: Runaan's Hurricane
Runaan's Hurricane.effect: Basic attacks fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing 60% of the wearer's attack damage and applying on-hit effects.

Titanic Hydra.name: Titanic Hydra
Titanic Hydra.effect: Basic attacks deal an additional 3% of the wearer's maximum health as magic damage to the target and adjacent enemies behind them.

Repeating Crossbow.name: Repeating Crossbow
Repeating Crossbow.effect: When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants a stacking +30% attack speed and +30% critical Strike chance for the remainder of combat.

Rabadon's Deathcap.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
Rabadon's Deathcap.effect: The wearer's spell power is +75% more effective.

Luden's Echo.name: Luden's Echo
Luden's Echo.effect: The wearer's spells deal 150 magic damage to the first target hit and up to 3 nearby enemies.

Locket of the Iron Solari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
Locket of the Iron Solari.effect: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300 damage for 8 seconds.

Ionic Spark.name: Ionic Spark
Ionic Spark.effect: Whenever an enemy casts a spell, the wearer deals 100 true damage to the caster.

Morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
Morellonomicon.effect: When the wearer deals damage with their spells, they burn the target, dealing 20% of the target's maximum health as true damage and preventing 80% of healing over 10 seconds. Unique.

Jeweled Guantlet.name: Jeweled Guantlet
Jeweled Guantlet.effect: The wearer's spells can critically strike.

Seraph's Embrace.name: Seraph's Embrace
Seraph's Embrace.effect: Gain 20 Mana after casting a spell.

Frozen Heart.name: Frozen Heart
Frozen Heart.effect: Reduces the Attack Speed of adjacent enemies by 25%.

Hush.name: Hush
Hush.effect: Basic Attacks have a 33% chance to silence the target, preventing the them from gaining mana for 4 seconds.

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.effect: When the wearer falls below 30% health, nearby allies are healed for 1200 Health after a 2.5 second delay. This effect can trigger once per combat.

Hand of Justice.name: Hand of Justice
Hand of Justice.effect: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic attacks and spells deal +50.0% Damage, Basic attacks heal 50.0 Health on-hit

Thornmail.name: Thornmail
Thornmail.effect: When the wearer is hit by a Basic Attack, they reflect 100% of the mitigated damage as magic damage.

Sword Breaker.name: Sword Breaker
Sword Breaker.effect: Basic Attacks have a 33% chance to disarm the target for 3 seconds, preventing that enemy from Basic Attacking.

Red Buff.name: Red Buff
Red Buff.effect: Basic Attacks burn the target, dealing 20% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and preventing 80% of healing for the duration of the burn.

Iceborn Guantlet.name: Iceborn Guantlet
Iceborn Guantlet.effect: When the wearer dodges, they create a zone of ice. Enemies inside the zone have their Attack Speed reduced by 25%.

Dragon's Claw.name: Dragon's Claw
Dragon's Claw.effect: Wearer gains 50% resistance to magic damage.

Zephyr.name: Zephyr
Zephyr.effect: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 6 seconds.

Quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
Quicksilver.effect: The wearer gains a shield that prevents the next crowd control effect from applying. This shield refreshes after 3 seconds.

Warmog's Armor.name: Warmog's Armor
Warmog's Armor.effect: The wearer regenerates 6% of their missing Health per second.

Trap Claw.name: Trap Claw
Trap Claw.effect: Grants a shield that blocks the first enemy spell that hits them. The enemy that breaks the shield is stunned for 4 seconds.

Force of Nature.name: Force of Nature
Force of Nature.effect: The wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.

Thief's Gloves.name: Thief's Gloves
Thief's Gloves.effect: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.
